summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ELEVEN EVER Electric Nail Drill, Professional Portable Nail File Drill Grinder Manicure Pedicure Tools for Polishing, Sanding, Removing Gel and Acrylic Nails (silver) … (silver) (ND-02black)
Review Date: 2019/07/20
Store: ELEVEN EVER
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ELEVEN EVER', 'Material': 'Aluminum', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Maximum Rotational Speed': '30000 RPM', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.17 x 6.22 x 2.91 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '722943850534'}
Review Text: Decent selection of bits for home use on nails.  Came with a few extras that are nice if you are just starting to do your own finger or toe nails.  This is a plug in the wall electric tool, remember to keep it away from water...and children it is not a toy even though this is in cute pinks and would really be attractive to most kids.  Has adjustable speed and seemed to do ok for me, if anything changes I will come change my review.
Review Title: Corded electric nail drill and attachments
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nxconsu 8Pcs Rhinestone Headbands for Women Girls Teens Kids Fashion Comfort No Hurting Hair Accessories Thin Hair Bands Crystal Exquisite Color Selection
Review Date: 2020/10/23
Store: Nxconsu
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Silk, Cotton', 'Fabric Type': 'Rhinestone', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 6.77 x 1.54 inches; 8.5 Ounces'}
Review Text: These are certainly pretty, the colors are a great selection for any age...but I will not be wearing them as they are a bit too snug for me and at the ends and they have only used some kind of sticky fabric to cover the metal tips.  I do not think they will stick there for long with putting on and off  of your head.  But for 8 pieces at just under 17.00 you probably could find a way to cover those tips if you were so inclined and they fit your head comfortably.
Review Title: Pretty assorted colors of rhinestones
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hoop Headbands for Women Premium Tortoise Acetate Wide Headbands No-Slip Grip Hair Hoop Styling Accessorie for Girls,Twin Pack(Marble)
Review Date: 2020/12/23
Store: CÉLLOT
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Number of Items': '2', 'Brand': 'CÉLLOT', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.29 x 5.59 x 1.26 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: These are nice wide bands, I love that about them...but, they are also too long on me, I’m an adult woman and I feel my head is of average size, but these are probably near to an inch too long on each side of my head.  I like that they have just a few teeth to grip your hair, they go on easy enough but just too long, can not keep one on for too long, start to hurt my head where they touch.  The colors are interesting combos, I think they would be wise to make some that are in more neutral shades too, a lot of people would like whites with pink or taupe, or black and gray etc.
Review Title: Colorful wide hairbands
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Spove Spiral Hair Ties Hair Coils Hair Coil Seamless Non-slip Mixed Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women & Kids 15pcs
Review Date: 2021/05/25
Store: SPOVE
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Plastic, Cotton', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'SPOVE', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '15', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 5.83 x 1.3 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '631145785158'}
Review Text: I like it is such a nice collection, not all the same, prints and solids.  This is a really good price point also, many other sets are double this price or more.  They are large enough to work on an adult ponytail as well.  They came in a cute sheer drawstring bag too, would make a nice Christmas stocking stuffer!  I would suggest these to anyone.
Review Title: NICE collection of ponytail holders!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - No, Orange, Yellow or Brassy Tones - Best Toner Treatment for Brassiness - Blonde, Grey, Bleached or Silver Hair - Sulfate Free
Review Date: 2021/05/25
Store: PURE NATURE LUX SPA
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Nourishing,Clean,Gentle', 'Material Type Free': 'Sulfate Free', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'PURE NATURE LUX SPA', 'Hair Type': 'Color', 'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 6.06 x 3.19 inches; 2.68 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'PURE NATURE LUX SPA', 'UPC': '765066671143'}
Review Text: I like that it came packaged very safely in a cardboard box that fit the shampoo and the conditioner, so NO leaks while shipping!  With white/gray hair I have learned that I NEED to use conditioner plus my hair is naturally curly so there’s that!  This product washed my hair well, and rinsed out well...the conditioner left it feeling re-hydrated and smooth and easy to use my huge toothed comb to comb through it.  Priced well and I would suggest to anyone!
Review Title: Deals with yellow!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bwana Butter Sweet Almond Oil is cold-pressed Rich in Vitamin A, E, B, & Essential Fatty Acids. Perfect > Sensual or Therapeutic Massage, Skin & Hair Care. Non-Greasy Carrier Oil for Soaps & Cosmetics
Review Date: 2021/06/07
Store: Bwana Butter
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bwana Butter', 'Scent': 'Coconut,Almond', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '7.24 x 1.73 x 1.69 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '716252475373'}
Review Text: I love almond oil for my skin and my hair and nails.  I don’t use it to cook with or ingest in anyway but I have used this on my skin for years!  I sometimes scent my oil with an essential oil and this would be a perfect carrier oil for that purpose if you are entertaining trying out making a scented skin oil.  I would recommend this to anyone.
Review Title: Unscented cold pressed natural almond oil
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

    SUMMARY:

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history reveals several consistent patterns highlighting this individual's preferences. A majority of the products received average to high ratings, indicating a moderate satisfaction level. The reviews suggest a strong inclination towards beauty and personal care items, particularly related to hair and nails, indicating a focus on self-grooming and aesthetics.

Common themes emerge around the purpose of enhancing appearance and convenience in personal care routines. The user shows a preference for products that offer versatility and ease of use, such as multi-functional hair accessories and effective hair care formulas.

Quality is a recurring concern; the reviewer expresses dissatisfaction with products that are poorly sized or uncomfortable. However, they appreciate good packaging and effective performance, particularly in skincare and haircare products. 

Price sensitivity is also evident, as the reviewer actively compares prices and values good deals without compromising on quality. Items that are perceived as worthwhile, despite some quality issues, still attract positive feedback due to their pricing.

Overall, this individual values aesthetic enhancement and practicality in personal care, displays clear preferences for effective, versatile, and fairly priced products, while remaining attentive to quality and fit.

target_interaction.title: Fabric covered headbands
target_interaction.text: These are a nice fabric, the inside of them is like a suede cloth fabric, so they help to hold your hair in place.  They mention elastic, there is no elastic in mine, can’t see any, can’t feel any, and when I put the band in my hair its like a regular plastic headband that is covered in cloth.  These are longer than usual, I can not see a child or a young adult wearing these, they go way past the back of your ears, makes for a tight fit if you are wearing glasses.  I like the three colors of the animal print.
target_interaction.title_meta: Aldqtz Headbands for Women Girls 3 pcs Leopard Cute Boho Fashion Elastic Wide Leopard Hair Bands Accessories(Black）
